abstract: A TV commentator's quip that he would not trust a left-footed player to take a penalty kick is proved wrong by the numbers this season in M.L.S.
snippet: A TV commentator's quip that he would not trust a left-footed player to take a penalty kick is proved wrong by the numbers this season in M.L.S.
lead_paragraph: Fox Soccer analyst Warren Barton shared a peculiar thought on air last February shortly after Everton had ousted Chelsea from the F.A. Cup on penalties at Stamford Bridge.

headline.main: Left-Footed Penalty Takers Showing the Way in M.L.S.
